K12n2990u_001:0: Āryaśrī grahamātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī omnamo bhagavate āryya graha mātṛkāyai om namo sarvaṁbuddha bodhisatbebhya evaṁ mayā śruta mekasmin samaye
K12n2990u_001:5: mahoragāpsarādibhirāditya. somāṁ gāra budha bṛhaspati śukra; śaniścara,
K12n2990u_001:6: rāhu ketubhiraṣṭāviṁ śati nakṣatrādibhistūyamāno mahāvajra samayā laṁkāra byūhonāmabyu tthāyā dhisthānādhiṣṭite siṁhāsane biharatisma ||
K12n2990u_001:20: padmaketu nāṁca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena ratnaketunāṁca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena ||
K12n2990u_001:24: evaṁpramukhai mahābodhisatba śatasahasrai sārddhaṁ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto bhagabān dharma paryyāyaṁ deśa yamtisma ||
K12n2990u_001:25: ādaukalyāṇaṁ madhyekalyāṇaṁ paryya basāne kalyāṇaṁ svarthasuvyañjanaṁ kebalaṁ paripūrṇaṁ pariśuddhaṁ paryyabadātaṁ brahmacaryyaṁ saṁprakāśayatisma
K12n2990u_001:26: atha khalu punarbajrapāṇi bodhisatva staparṣatmaṇḍala mavalokyā sanādutthāya ṛddhyadhiṣṭhānāyā neka bhagavanta makane śatasahasra pradakṣiṇī kṛtya praṇamya puratoniṣadya ratnagarbheṇa paryeka mābhuhya līlayāstatparṣa nmaṇḍala mavalokya bajrājaliṁ svahṛdaye pratiṣṭhāppa bhagavanta bhetadavocat ||
K12n2990u_001:27: grahāśca bhagavānu grānugrarū pāśca raudrāraudra rūpāśca krūrā krararūpāśca satvāviheṭhayanti ||
K12n2990u_001:31: keṣāṁcid dravyamapaharanti keṣāṁcid dīrdhāyūḥ satvānāmalpāyū kurvanti;
K12n2990u_001:33: taddeśayatu bhagabān dharmaparyyāyaṁ yena sarvasatvānī sarbopadravebhyaḥ rakṣābhaviṣyati |
K12n2990u_001:35: sādhusādhu bajrapāṇe yastvaṁ sarbasatbānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya kṛpā cinta mutpādya guhyāti guhyataraṁ tathāgata samyaksaṁbuddhaṁ paripṛcchasi
K12n2990u_001:37: grahāṇā mugrarūpāṇāṁ kūrātibhīṣaṇa mukhānāṁ mahāguhyoti guhyataraṁ dibyapūjāśca arghaṁca jāppaṁca yathānukrama barṇabhedena sarbeṣāṁ yathā tuṣyanti
K12n2990u_001:43: athakhalu bhagabān śākyamunistathāgato rhantyasamyaksaṁbuddhaḥ svahṛdayāt karūṇā bikrīḍitaṁnāma raśmijāla muccāryya grahāṇāṁ mūddhiṁ prabeśayatiśma
K12n2990u_001:44: athatatkṣaṇā debate sarbegrahā ādityā dayotthāyā bhagabanta śākyamuni samyaksaṁbuddhena taddeśa yantu bhagabaṁstā dṛśaṁ dharmaparyyāya sāmagrī bhūtasya dharmabhānakasya rakṣākuryāma;
K12n2990u_001:45: guptiparitrāṇaṁ parigrahaṁ paripālanaṁ śāntisvastyayana daṇḍa parihāraṁ;
K12n2990u_001:50: athakhalu bhagavān śākyamuni stathāgato'rhana samyak saṁbuddho grahāṇāṁ mantrapūjā bhāṣantesma ||
K12n2990u_001:59: imāni bajrapāṇe navagrahāṇāṁ mantra hṛdayāni paṭhitasiddhāni yathānu krama varṇa bhedena diśāca gandha maṇḍalake cintaye padmamadhye dvādaśāṁgula pramāṇaṁ caturasraṁ caturdbāreṇa śobhitaṁ kūṭāgāraṁ cakra samanvitaṁ ||
K12n2990u_001:60: tanmadhye sita kamalopari kuṁkuma gandha maṇḍala kecittaye debabhāskaraṁ tāpasa rupadharaṁ raktavarṇa sahasra sūryyakoṭī samaprabho sindhūrabarṇa stejo mālina bigrahaṁ ||
K12n2990u_001:65: pūrbasyāṁdiśi raktakamalopari priyaṁgu gandha maṇḍalake somo brāhmaṇa iti jñeyaḥ sitabarṇa jaṭāmakuṭadharaṁ bhuja dbayena akṣasūtra kamaṇaḍalu dharaṁ kumuda puṣpābaśakta ||
K12n2990u_001:70: dakṣiṇasyāṁ diśi śukla kamalopari candana gandha maṇḍalake bhichu maṁgāra coktaṁ raktabarṇa ratna makuṭī śakti dharaṁ ||
K12n2990u_001:77: paścimasyāṁ diśi raktapadmopari kṛṣṇāguru gandhamaṇḍalake brahmacārī budha syāt pītavarṇa raktaśmaśru akṣasūtra kamaṇḍalūdharaṁ ||
K12n2990u_001:82: uttarasyāṁdiśi sitakamalopari deva dāru gandhamaṇḍake paribrājako guru ścaiva tapta kāñcana barṇābho raktaśmaśru akṣasūtra kamaṇḍalū dharaṁ
K12n2990u_001:83: asya deya dadhibhaktodana kṣīraṁbā ghṛtamadhū dhūpaṁ ||
K12n2990u_001:84: om lohitabarṇa nirgamāya bṛha spataye namaḥ bhogā spadāyasbāhā || 5 ||
K12n2990u_001:86: agneyāṁdiśi raktapadmopari candana gandha maṇḍalake śulka pāśa paraśu brahmacārī gokṣīrabarṇā barāmbho jaṭāmakūṭākṣa kamaṇḍalūdharaṁḥ ||
K12n2990u_001:89: om namaḥ śulkādhipataye asūrottamāya birahe sbāhā || 6 ||
K12n2990u_001:91: naiṛtyāṁdiśi sita kamalopari nīlacandana gandhamaṇḍake śaniścara;
K12n2990u_001:92: kṛṣṇabarṇa kṣapaṇakojñeyaḥ phaṇāmṛta pītajaṭā makuṭaśmaśruḥ akṣasūtra khikhirikādharaṁ ||
K12n2990u_001:95: om śaninī lāmbhosaṁ kṛṣṇāya kṛṣṇavarṇāya kṛṣṇabhuk svāhā || 7 ||
K12n2990u_001:97: vāyubyāṁdiśi raktāmbhopari tagarapādi gandha maṇḍalake kāpāliko rājābartta barṇanibhorddha debaraha bhayānacayūge daṁṣṭrākarāla bhṛkuṭikṛta lalāṭa pañcabarṇa meghamadhyetara bhujābhyāṁ candrasūryya kamalābhi nayasthitaḥ asyadeyaṁ māṁṣābhiṣabhojanaṁ ||
K12n2990u_001:99: om namo bikaṭa baktāya rudhirāsane rāho bhṛṁgāñjana nibhāya amṛtapribhāya svāhā || 8 ||
K12n2990u_001:101: īśānyāṁdiśi raktaśaro rūho paripṛkkā gandhamaṇḍalake caṇḍāla keto bhavet ||
K12n2990u_001:102: dhūmrabarṇa kṛtāñjatāñjali nāgākṛtisvapuccha bhṛta asyabhojana dhṛtapūraka sajjarasadhūpa;
K12n2990u_001:103: om dhūmrāmma varṇasaṁnibhāya jyoti ketabe svāhā || 9 ||
K12n2990u_001:110: ṣaṭbhujā hastadvayena vyākhyānamūdrā dakṣiṇa kulīśadharā vāmepadmacāpadharā ratna makūṭi nīlavajraparyyako pariṣṭhā candrā sana samāśritā ṣoḍaśākārā sarvā laṁkāra bhūṣitā ||
K12n2990u_001:115: siṁdhūra sameta yathānu kramabarṇa bhedena patākādeyāḥ ||
K12n2990u_001:117: pratyekaṁ dīpodeyā ghṛta madhubhyāṁ śaṁkhaṁpūrayitvā paṁcaratnaṁ prakṣipyārdho deyaḥsarbeṣāṁmūkha pyatodeyamiti ||
K12n2990u_001:119: namaḥ sarbatathāgatebhya. sarbāsā paripūrakebhya. sarbapari pūrṇābhakti.svāhā ||
K12n2990u_001:124: imāni bajrapāṇe nabagrahāṇāṁ mantra hṛdayāni paṭhitatiddhāni ||
K12n2990u_001:125: yathānu kramabarṇabhe dena gandha maṇḍalakaṁ kṛtvā dvādaśāṁgula pramāṇaṁ maṇḍalamadhye pūjayitavyāni tāmramṛnmaya rupyādi bhājanena arghaṁdatvā aṣṭottara śatabārā parijappa paścatpuna bajrapāṇe grahamātṛkā nāma dhāraṇī mantrapadāni saptabārānū ścārayitavyāni ||
K12n2990u_001:129: yaścakhalu puna bajrapāṇe bhikṣu bhikṣu ṇyupāsako pāsikāvā anayāsatvajātīyā;
K12n2990u_001:132: yaścakhalu vajrapāṇe grahamaṇḍala madhye pujayitvā dinedine bācayiṣyati ||
K12n2990u_001:142: omnama sarba grahānāṁ sarbāṁśā paripurakānīṁ omnamo nakṣatrāṇāṁ ||

K12n2990u_001:163: tataḥ pūrṇamāsyā mahorātraṁ pūjā kṛtbā vācayentasya navanavati varṣāṇi mṛtyubhayaṁ nabhavati ||
K12n2990u_001:166: athate sarve grahāḥ sādhū bhagavanniti praṇabhyāṁttarhito bhavanniti ||
K12n2990u_001:167: idamavocaṭ bhagavān nāntamanā steca bhikṣavaḥ sāca sarbāvatī parṣatsa debamānuṣāḥsura,
